valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 1 Dec 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Tue 2 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 959 moving steadily east, expected west of Rockall 972 by 0600 tomorrow. New low expected Fair Isle 979 by same time

Wind
Cyclonic, mainly southerly or southeasterly, 6 to gale 8, decreasing 4 to 6 for a time, perhaps severe gale 9 later.

Rough becoming rough or very rough.

Rain or showers.

Good, occasionally poor.
